content: I can see that a Swift client library for STU3 was just released today (https://github.com/smart-on-fhir/Swift-FHIR/tags). Will there similarly be a release of the JavaScript client (https://github.com/smart-on-fhir/client-js) for STU3? If so, when is this expected?

Great question @Michael Christensen! In theory the existing FHIR.js (https://github.com/FHIR/fhir.js) library should basically work (agreed @nicola (RIO)?) unchanged, as should the SMART wrapper library. That said, there's at least one known issue (there's a hard-coded list of resources in SMART's wrapper that can auto-fill a "patient" parameter), and I'm sure there are more in practice.
@Nikolai Schwertner have you experimented here yet?
Are the python class libraries updated for STU3 too?
Yes Eric, it's on the master branch, tagged 3.0.0. Will be pushed to pip soon.
